data.text:
This is important to many viewers, as we believe hollyoaks was so much better during 2006-2010 period. Many viewers have been lost but the hope of returns are still with many people, these characters haven't been forgotten. These brought so much to the show, the storylines and personalities were so much better. If this is signed by over 3000 people (this figure will probably be changed, its a starting point) this will be sent off to lime pictures producers and executives. Please be friendly and sign this if you want your favourite characters to return, no hate guys, love you oaksters!<3

This petition was created as of 15/2/2015.

People this petition is fighting for their return.

Sam 'O.B' O'Brien played by Darren Jeffries, Jake Dean played by Kevin sacre, Craig Dean played by Guy Burnet, Warren Fox played by Jamie Lomas, Barry 'newt' Newton played my Nico Mirallegro, Justin Burton played by Chris Fountain, Gilbert 'Gilly' Roach played by Anthony Quinlan, Hannah Ashworth played by Emma Rigby, Josh Ashworth played by Sonny Flood and Jacqui McQueen played by Claire Cooper.

This was created by a group of hollyoaks roleplay and fan pages/accounts, by no means is this a fake account or catfishers! Thank you me lovelies!
